summary: Encapsulates a pretrained CANINE model specialized for token classification tasks, managing its configuration and providing an interface for inference and fine‑tuning on character‑level NLP problems.
business_intent: Offer a ready‑to‑use character‑level token classification solution for applications such as named entity recognition, part‑of‑speech tagging, or any token‑wise labeling task, improving performance on languages with complex tokenization.
